title: Dragonlance Collection 2.0
description:
I've edited all the best copies I could find to a decent level, no deep proofreading, but every book is now readable and uniformly formatted. Most of the book structure is in place; cover, title, dedication(if I could find it), chapters, pagebreaks(dragonlances) etc. I've ocr'ed a few more books, some of which I believe are still scanned PDF's from retail sources. Ive removed all sigs, copyrights, program tags, deleted all of the extra chapters at ends of books, all "Also buy these/about the authors" pages from retail copies.

Heres the book list([b]X[/b]'s are missing knovels):

144/165

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

O Tales of Uncle Trapspringer by Dixie Lee McKeone
